message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even beyond its worth.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I'm getting closer to the price I'm comfortable with, but I still need to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for it.
